meanings.definition: Extremely heavy or weighing a great deal.
meanings.sent1: The box was superheavy and hard to lift.
meanings.sent2: The elephant is superheavy compared to the rabbit.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the superheavy backpack made me feel like a superhero!
meanings.sent4: The superheavy rain poured down relentlessly all day.
meanings.sent5: The superheavy boulder blocked the path completely.

meanings.sent1: The superheavy hammer easily smashed the rock.
meanings.sent2: The superheavy storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The superheavy door wouldn't budge no matter how hard we pushed.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a superheavy impact on his decision.
meanings.sent5: The superheavy anchor kept the boat securely in place.

meanings.definition: A very heavy element, especially one with an atomic number greater than 100.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of superheavy elements.
meanings.sent2: The discovery of a new superheavy element excited the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The superheavy in the periodic table made the students curious.
meanings.sent4: The quest for superheavy elements continues in the scientific community.
meanings.sent5: The lab equipment is specially designed to handle superheavy elements.
